introduction: Welcome back, I hope your coffee was good. This is the last session of the day.
The next speaker is Graham Deacon, from Ocado Technologies.
The next speaker is Luka Peternel, from IIT.
The next speaker is Marc Killpack, from BYU.
Wow, we had a lot of interesting talks today. Time to discuss!
Sorry to interrupt, but it is time to leave the room and head to the Welcome party! Thanks for the beautiful discussions. I cannot drink, otherwise I would join you! Well, see you tomorrow.
